Title: We will not attack unless we are attacked, if we are attacked, we will certainly counterattack
Publisher: Shanghaishi chuban gemingzu (上海市出版革命组)
Notes: Soldiers at the border with the Soviet Union, believed to be a military threat to China. There actually had been a border conflict in 1969.The text board in the image says 中国神圣領土 决不容许侵犯 (China's sacred territory can never be violated).
